list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: in a suitable state for an activity, action, or situation; fully prepared.
easily available or obtained; within reach.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was a ready supply of drink
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một nguồn cung cấp thức uống sẵn sàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: prepare (someone or something) for an activity or purpose.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the spare transformer was readied for shipment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy biến áp dự phòng đã được chuẩn bị cho lô hàng
